name: FIT Radio
overview:
FIT Radio is a mobile and web application that streams high-energy, DJ engineered music of all genres designed to amp your workout.

Russell Greene, the owner of Fit Radio, has been working in the nightclub industry for 10 years. He is currently a Partner and Head Manager of one of the top 3 nightclubs in the country, Opera Nightclub. After receiving multiple requests for live DJ mixes from his staff, friends, clients, and partygoers, he realized there was a huge, untouched market right at his fingertips. This is when he came up with the concept for Fit Radio.

Instead of spending hours every week searching for new, high-energy music to download to a computer and then upload it to an ipod, you can simply login to FIT Radio. Our professional DJs do the leg work for you, and they mix the tracks seamlessly, ensuring continuously fast-paced music throughout your entire workout. We add new content daily so the listener can always hear something new.

In todayâ€™s world, music is everywhere, and as time goes on, the easier it becomes to obtain. What truly sets Fit Radio apart from its competitors is its intent to supply non-stop, high-energy mixed music produced by Professional Mix DJs. Other radio stations only supply the listener with a single song at a time and have no control over BPMs (Beats Per Minute). Unlike Fit Radio, they play songs full of monotonous moments that can drag on for minutes at a time, and they are full of interruptions. There is always the option of Podcast, however, this embodies nothing but restriction. The listener is completely limited to one DJ and one genre. In all actuality, Fit Radio stands alone in its own original, distinct market.
